00031 /* Creation flags. */
00032 #define Q_PRIO   XNSYNCH_PRIO   /* Pend by task priority order. */
00033 #define Q_FIFO   XNSYNCH_FIFO   /* Pend by FIFO order. */
00034 #define Q_DMA    0x100          /* Use memory suitable for DMA. */
00035 #define Q_SHARED 0x200          /* Use mappable shared memory. */
00036 
00037 #define Q_UNLIMITED 0           /* No size limit. */
00038 
00039 /* Operation flags. */
00040 #define Q_NORMAL     0x0
00041 #define Q_URGENT     0x1
00042 #define Q_BROADCAST  0x2
